citation: Residential Tenancy (Extension of Emergency Period) Order (No. 3) 2020 (Tas)
text:
Residential Tenancy (Extension of Emergency Period) Order (No. 3) 2020

I make the following order under section 3A(1) of the Residential Tenancy Act 1997 .

27 November 2020

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Building and Construction

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Residential Tenancy (Extension of Emergency Period) Order (No. 3) 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 2 December 2020.

3. Extension of emergency period for COVID-19 emergency
    The emergency period that was to expire on 1 December 2020 is extended to 31 January 2021.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 November 2020

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
